Information Processing.description: Involves retrieving, extracting, and integrating information from diverse sources to produce structured and relevant outputs.

Communication.description: Handles interactive conversation, translation, and summarization tasks to enable effective and natural information exchange.

Classification & Categorization.description: Assigns input data to predefined categories or labels based on content, features, or context.

Text Generation.description: Produces coherent and contextually appropriate text such as sentences, stories, articles, and emails.

Image Generation.description: Creates visual images from textual prompts, enabling artistic rendering, design prototyping, or visual storytelling.

Code Generation.description: Outputs functional code such as functions, scripts, or algorithms based on user instructions or natural language input.

Analysis & Reasoning.description: Performs logical inference, mathematical computation, and causal or analytical reasoning to support understanding and problem-solving.

Agent Actions.description: Executes tool usage, API calls, and integration with external systems to complete tasks beyond text generation.

Decision Support.description: Provides predictions, recommendations, and data-driven insights to assist in informed decision-making.

Multimodal Tasks.description: Processes and integrates multiple data types—such as text, image, speech, or video—for cross-modal understanding and generation.
